attributes.action: Make the carrying and use of catapults and slingshots in public illegal.
attributes.additional_details: We have had a local issue for years & this is now a serious national issue. Children & adults are carrying catapults/ slingshots as weapons on a daily basis. Parks & High Streets are the main targets. Animals are being shot, maimed & killed for fun & left to die slow painful deaths. Adults are threatened with being shot on a regular basis & sometimes actually shot. Councils do nothing to stop this. Police are constantly being called out to the same people over & over again. It has to stop!
attributes.background: The use and carrying of catapults and slingshots in public places especially parks and town centers needs to be made illegal.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641152
